Title: The way of military and civil, is tension alternating with relaxation - Chairman Mao's "Talk with the editors of the Jinsui Daily"
Designer: Su Guang (苏光)Wang Yingchun (王迎春)Yang Lizhou (杨力舟)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社) Beijing
Notes: Mao met the editors of the Jinsui Daily on 2 April, 1948. He spoke about how newspapers should propagate the Party's policy on Land Reform in the right way, and praised the Jinsui Daily's "struggle to oppose rightist tendencies".
